main.description: Official SPICE website - Surveillance Platform for Infectious disease and Epidemic intelligence

ProductOverview.Summary: SPICE (Surveillance Platform for Infectious disease and Epidemic intelligence) is an open-source platform for infectious disease surveillance and epidemic intelligence.
ProductOverview.Description: SPICE provides tools for monitoring infectious diseases, analyzing trends, and generating early warnings for potential outbreaks. It integrates data from multiple sources to provide comprehensive surveillance capabilities for public health officials and researchers.
ProductOverview.PrimaryFunctionality: Infectious disease surveillance and epidemic intelligence platform
ProductOverview.Users: Public health officials, epidemiologists, researchers, and disease surveillance teams

Reach.SummaryOfReach: SPICE has been implemented in various public health settings to support infectious disease surveillance and epidemic intelligence activities.

Maturity.SummaryOfMaturity: All maturity model assessments are self-reported by the funded organization leading the development of the global good.

Community.DescriptionOfCommunity: SPICE is developed and maintained by a global community focused on infectious disease surveillance and epidemic intelligence.

HostAnchorOrganization.name: SPICE
HostAnchorOrganization.description: Open source surveillance platform for infectious disease and epidemic intelligence

Sustainability.Description: SPICE is supported through open source development and community contributions.
